params.preferredToken: The token the recipient wants to receive
params.recipient: The address receiving the swapped tokens
params.yieldAmount: The amount of yield tokens (USDC) to swap

returns.amountOut: The amount of preferred tokens received

settleWithSwap(address,uint256,address).notice: Swap yield tokens to recipient's preferred token via a Uniswap v4 pool
